desc: While decorating my children’s bedrooms a while back, I want to create a space for them that was not just fun and cute but also sustainable and natural with a rattan flair. This birthed my dream to create a furniture outlet for like minded mothers and nature lovers interested in creating similar design concepts.

layout.text: Luxury Bohemian furniture for you and your MINI
100% sustainable products handcrafted by our artisans with love
